EmailTemplate.name: CONFIRMATION-NO RESPONSE
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} - Confirmation of Trademark Compliance: {!Case.Customer_Lab_Result__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Company__c}:
We have not received a response to our letter dated _____________ regarding the unauthorized use or misuse of our DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} trademark. Nevertheless, upon confirmation and verification of your current website "{!Case.Profit_Center__c}" (or place where the misuse/infringement was reported), we have noticed that you have taken the necessary actions to remove or correct all use of DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} to our satisfaction. This letter, therefore, confirms compliance to our requests. Please be advised that we will continue to monitor your website and should any unauthorized use or misuse of DuPont™ {!Case.Product_Selected__c} be seen or brought to our attention as a repeat offense, we reserve the right to enforce our trademark to the fullest extent of the law.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Sincerely,
DuPont Brand Protection Center
